channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Be Careful Before Pre-Ordering Apple’s iPhone Air
item.description: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge should serve as a warning to anyone who plans to pre-order the Apple iPhone Air.

item.title: There’s More ‘Wednesday’ Coming Than Just Season 3 With New Spin-Off
item.description: Wednesday season 3's release date may be ages away, but there's a new show coming that may help things out among fans.

item.title: AI Alone Won’t Save CX, But Gig “Superagents” Can
item.description: Customer experience (CX) leaders have always been under pressure to cut costs while keeping customers happy. AI simply became the latest lever to pull...

item.title: Bungie, You Need To Pull The ‘Destiny 2’ Emergency Lever This Minute
item.description: Destiny 2 needs to understand just how bad Ash and Iron is and take drastic steps to fix things before the community ghosts them completely.

item.title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle’s Rotten Tomatoes Audience Score Is Wild
item.description: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle is nearly here, and so far, audiences are raving about it like they did with Mugen Train. Here's its Rotten Tomatoes sco...

item.title: Items in motion
item.description: A frog has no trouble grabbing a fast-moving fly in midair. But the same fly, sitting on a leaf, is safe, essentially invisible to the frog. We’re a l...

item.title: Working for advertisers

item.title: Making a point

item.description: Everyone is always doing their best. Given their situation, priorities, and awareness (the circumstances), people make choices. If we want to change h...

item.title: False scarcity
